nodes.text: Cell Block 1138 was an alleged prison area aboard the the DS-1 Death Star Mobile Battle Station. Luke Skywalker mentioned the location to Lieutenant Shann Childsen in Detention Block AA-23 as part of an effort to conceal his identity and the identity of Han Solo and Chewbacca. The Imperial officer stated that he was not notified of the transfer from Cell Block 1138, and that he would have to clear it.
Cell Block 1138 was first mentioned Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, and is an instance of 1138 in Star Wars.
